long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join us for our beta release and save time and money on your weekly grocery shop by having your entire shopping cart compared between Coles and Woolworths instantly for free. 

Stop paying too much for your weekly groceries shop. SmartCart compares your entire cart when you shop online at either Coles or Woolies instantly. 

How does it work? 

You just shop as normal and then when you’re ready to checkout we will pop up to compare your entire cart instantly. 
We analyse prices regularly to make sure you’re always getting the most updated price. We match tens of thousands of products to make sure you’re getting the same thing between Coles or Woolies but for the best possible price! 

Why

It’s simple, Australians pay too much for their groceries and there is too little competition. 
We know there are always deals on for individual products, but what about for your entire basket of items? We also know that the big providers use this technology to track each other’s prices to make sure they don’t price items too low. We see one clear loser in this situation, you the end consumer. We are using their same technology to help you make better buying decisions. Happy shopping! 

Please note this is a beta release, so there may be some bugs that we are still working on. If you have any ideas or improvements, please email us! 

That’s not all SmartCart can do  

COMPARE PRICES IN REAL TIME
We compare the price for the product you want in real-time across thousands of retailers saving you the hassle of searching for it yourself. Once you’ve found the product your after we’ll notify you if we’ve found it cheaper somewhere else. 

COUPON CODES, PROMO CODES AND DEALS
We also automatically apply coupon codes at the checkout saving you even more money. Better yet we get access to exclusive promotional codes and discounts that actually work in Australia for our members. SmartCart’s chrome extension is 100% free. And yes, we’ll also apply promo codes at Coles and Woolies to make sure you are getting the best possible savings. 

How does SmartCart work? 
1. Click 'Add to Chrome' and install to your Chrome browser for free
2. Just shop as normal and SmartCart will pop up at the right time to help you get the best deal. 
3. SmartCart will also pop open at the checkout to test and apply working promo codes for you. It can also do this for Coles and Woolworths to save you even more money! 

That's it! Just three easy steps to save money without the hassle.

https://joinsmartcart.com
